title: Appeal Representation
description: Schema defining the metadata for appeal representations, such as statements, third-party comments and final comments

representationId.description: The unique identifier for the representation
representationId.$comment: This is a composite key with the caseReference and a representation counter

status.$comment: BO workflow should validate or withdraw a representation.Enumerated list expected to change.

redacted.description: Indicates if the representation is redacted

redactedRepresentation.description: The redacted version of the representation

redactedBy.description: Unique identifier for the case team member that performed the redaction
redactedBy.$comment: This is the user in Entra ID

invalidOrIncompleteDetails.description: An list of reasons why the representation has been marked as invalid or incomplete.
invalidOrIncompleteDetails.$comment: The list will contain items only if the status is `invalid` or `invalid_incomplete`

examples: Another reason for setting a representation as invalid

otherInvalidOrIncompleteDetails.description: A list of free text reasons why the representation has been marked as invalid or incomplete
otherInvalidOrIncompleteDetails.$comment: The list will contain items only if the status is `invalid` or `invalid_incomplete` and if invalidOrIncompleteDetails list includes 'other_reason'

source.description: Source of the representation (citizen or LPA)

serviceUserId.description: Service User Id of the person or organisation making the representation
